full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal

### Invitation to Tender 
**PW-22-01005503**

We invite experienced Programmeurs/Analystes (Informatics Professional Services) to participate in this Request for Proposal for the selection of a contractor to provide services to the Government of Canada's Industry Canada contract.

#### Tender Information
| Category | Value
| --- | ---
| **Tender Reference** | PW-22-01005503
| **Contract Title** | Programmer Analyst Services
| **Solicitation Number** | IC204250
| **Date of Publication** | August 26th, 2022
| **Tender Closing Date** | September 12th, 2022, 3:00 PM EST
| **Trade Agreements** | Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, etc. 

#### Contract Details
| Category | Value
| --- | --- 
| **Contract Category** | SRV (Service)
| **Provement Method** | Selective Tendering (Competitive bidding)
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
| **Regions of Opportunity** | National Capital Region (RCN)
| **Expected Start Date** | Not specified
| **Expected End Date** | Not specified
| **Contracting Entity** | Industry Canada
| **Contracting Entity Address** | 235 Queen St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5, Canada
| **Contact Person** | Heidi Gagne
| **Email** | Heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca
| **Phone** | 343-542-9135

Please refer to the attached documents for further information. 
Attachments are available at the following URLs: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/3db4019d185c5836c5d0747f95bd5c11/npp_ic204250.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/187a60d2e0f444a42bf99e44fe77e548/apm_ic204250.pdf. 
Deadline for proposals is September 12th, 2022, 3:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted. 
Please submit all proposals to Heidi Gagne as per the
